name: Desert Locusts
text: 1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner monsters/nIf this card is Synchro Summoned: This turn player discards 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Desert Locusts" once per turn. Once per Chain, during your opponent's Main Phase: You can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon using this card you control.
